title: The Immortal
description: Note: This was a free, serialized story collected into multiple volumes (intended to be the second of five), still available for download on the author's website.-----------------The girls have survived the fight of their lives, but aren’t without scars. Genevieve must deal with the magicks she preformed to save everyone, as well as the fact that Michael almost let her die; Sage must face the grief and guilt surrounding a loved one’s death; and Merri’s past is rapidly closing in. Worse still, Michael has been keeping secrets about their origins, destiny, and the fact that they may not be the only Children of the Apocalypse after all...
author: Skyla Dawn Cameron
